mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.addtime as addtime ,a.biaoti as biaoti ,a.leixing as leixing ,a.neirong as neirong ,a.riqi as riqi
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM Xitonggonggao a
and a.addtime = #{params.addtimeStart} and DATE_FORMAT(a.addtime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.addtimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')
and a.addtime = #{params.addtimeEnd} and DATE_FORMAT(a.addtime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.addtimeEnd} , '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')
and a.biaoti like CONCAT('%',#{params.biaoti},'%')
and a.leixing like CONCAT('%',#{params.leixing},'%')
and a.neirong like CONCAT('%',#{params.neirong},'%')
and a.riqi = #{params.riqiStart} and DATE_FORMAT(a.riqi, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.riqiStart}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')
and a.riqi = #{params.riqiEnd} and DATE_FORMAT(a.riqi, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.riqiEnd} , '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')
order by a.id desc
